summary: This bill, the Child Care Availability and Affordability Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand tax credits and deductions related to child care. It increases the employer-provided child care credit, the amount excludable for dependent care assistance programs, and introduces a new, refundable credit for household and dependent care expenses. The bill also includes specific provisions for small businesses and defines qualifying individuals and employment-related expenses, as well as providing effective dates for these changes.
